author: dain
msg: Changed geronimo version to 1.1 and openejb version to 2.1

author: rahul
msg: Added easier support for custom actions. "Easier" implies that knowledge of Digester may not be required for adding some flavors of custom actions to augment those already available in the SCXML namespace.

As a demonstration, a custom action <my:hello name="..." /> registered to a fictitious namespace bound to prefix "my" is used in one of the test cases (it merely logs a hello to the value of the name attribute).
On a separate note, something that should have probably been done a long time ago -- added the canonical "hello world" example for Commons SCXML.
